data.name: Stealy Wheely Automobiley
data.detailed_description:
Stealy Wheely Automobile is an open world game where you can do what you want wherever you want. Steal cars and drive races against the police or start a fight against some mafiosi. Shoot in the air and cause some trouble in the city or hunt down criminals. Start with a few basic abilities and weapons and gain more once you level up.

Try to have some parkour action by running and jumping from wall to wall or make some flips with your car. Search for AI friends that follow and support you and fight against gangs. Collect their weapons and built an arsenal to be unbeatable!

data.short_description: Stealy Wheely Automobile is an open world game where you can do what you want wherever you want.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
